questionTitle: We had bread and milk ............................ breakfast.
Just before we ..................... London, there was a violent flood.

Do you mind ..................... in a small house with us?
This cake tastes ...................... I can't eat it.

It cost me ..................... money to travel all over the world.
We didn't use our time ............................. well as we should.
The bicycle ..................... at present.
The more we study, the ............................. we are.
I and ....................... friends will go camping next week.
The more paper we save, ............................. preserved .
Mr. Brown ..................... a computer already.
Our country is doing ............................. it did ten years ago.
Last night, they studied hard until .....................11 p.m.
Her marks are neither good ............................. bad.
The boy is quite fond ................ picture-books.
